pkgmetadata.longdescription: Box-Cox-Type Transformations for Linear and Logistic Models with Random Effects // Box-Cox-type transformations for linear and logistic models with random effects using non-parametric profile maximum likelihood estimation, as introduced in Almohaimeed (2018) http://etheses.dur.ac.uk/12831/ and Almohaimeed and Einbeck (2022) doi:10.1177/1471082X20966919. The main functions are 'optim.boxcox()' for linear models with random effects and 'boxcoxtype()' for logistic models with random effects.
